title: Heard a Rumor... REALLY hope it doesn't turn out like this
body:
So over on Surrender @ 20, on the Aurelion Sol cinematic comments a bunch of people are starting to point out how his face looks more anthropomorphic than like an actual dragon. This has lead to a lot speculation that he may be a two legged, anthropomorphic dragon. 

http://th07.deviantart.net/fs22/PRE/f/2008/017/1/b/Anthromorpic_Dragon_by_fluffy_wolf.jpg

Not that anything can be done if they have designed him like this, but please for the love of god don't add a furry to leauge of legends. ~~I have waited~~ We have all waited for a dragon champion since the announcement of Ao shin and I swear to god if we just get Renekton with wings i'm going to be 2000% done.

replies.body: Why is Rumble a furry, but no other yordle?
Well, the proper term would be "Scaly" if you think about it.
I'll honestly be very, very, very, very... so so very disappointed if he is anything but an ACTUAL dragon.
His face looks like a Chinese lion/dragon. Plus we already have an anthropomorphic dragon

Really? Of all the ways you could say 'Don't make this champion a dragon on legs, make them an actual dragon' you said 'don't add a furry'? In a game with AHRI and WUKONG in it.

Okay.

Okay...Well i mean that wouldnt be like a bad thing to the game since it is their design and im sure a star crushing galaxy dragon can be who he wants to be. Most likely he will be a huge normal dragon. A western dragon to be exact.
if they do that they should change his name to duke

Riot stated that one of the issues with making Ao Shin was that his model was difficult to make at the time. This is because he was _an actual dragon._
Riot is unlikely to change this.
